      • setDashStyle

        public void setDashStyle(java.lang.String dashStyle)
        The dashing or dot style for the plot line. For possible values see [this overview](http://jsfiddle.net/gh/get/library/pure/highcharts/highcharts/tree/master/samples/highcharts/plotoptions/series- dashstyle-all/).

        Try it:

         •  Dash and dot pattern

        accepted values:

         ["Solid", "ShortDash", "ShortDot", "ShortDashDot", "ShortDashDotDot", "Dot", "Dash" ,"LongDash", "DashDot", "LongDashDot", "LongDashDotDot"]

        default:

         Solid
